snippet: The proceedings against President Uhuru Kenyatta were closed three months after prosecutors dropped charges linking him to postelection violence in 2007.
lead_paragraph: The proceedings against President Uhuru Kenyatta were closed three months after prosecutors dropped charges linking him to postelection violence in 2007.

headline.main: International Criminal Court Formally Ends Case Against Kenya’s President

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
